recipe.ingredients: 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breasts, sliced into strips, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon paprika, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper, 1 medium red bell pepper, sliced, 1 medium green bell pepper, sliced, 1 medium yellow bell pepper, sliced, 1 large onion, sliced, 8 small whole-wheat tortillas, 1/2 cup low-fat sour cream or Greek yogurt, optional, 1/2 cup salsa, Lime wedges, for serving, Fresh cilantro, chopped, for garnish, optional
recipe.directions: In a large bowl, combine chicken strips with olive oil, chili powder, cumin, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and black pepper. Toss well to coat. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the seasoned chicken strips and cook for about 6 minutes or until fully cooked and browned. Remove chicken from the skillet and set aside. In the same skillet, add a bit more olive oil if necessary, and toss in the bell peppers and onion. Saut√© until vegetables are tender and slightly charred, about 5-7 minutes. Return the chicken to the skillet and stir to combine with the vegetables. Warm the tortillas according to the package instructions. Serve the chicken and vegetables with warm tortillas, and offer sour cream or Greek yogurt, salsa, and lime wedges on the side. Garnish with chopped fresh cilantro if desired.
